8.eng-name: The Book of Prayer - Two Eids

hadiths.text: Utba reported that his father Waqid al-Laithi said:'Umar b. Khattab asked me what the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) recited on 'Id day. I said:" The Hour drew near" and Qaf. By the Glorious Qur'an

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُقْرَأُ بِهِ فِي صَلاَةِ الْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: What Is To Be Recited In The 'Id Prayer?
